questions.question: Where can I purchase tickets?
questions.answer: You can purchase the tickets on our website. This can be done by going to the explore page and selecting the event you want tickets to. When ticketing sales for that event opens, you will be allowed to enter the queue for the ticket and subsequently purchase the ticket

questions.question: Am I able to choose my seats when purchasing online?
questions.answer: n order to facilitate a fast and efficient online purchase process for fans, our system automatically assigns the "Best available" option to each fan based on the price category they have chosen.

questions.question: I want to purchase tickets. Why is there a ticket limit?
questions.answer: In essence, our goal is to ensure that every individual has an equal opportunity to purchase tickets. The ticket limits are implemented to prevent the first person in line from purchasing all the seats, leaving none for others. These limits are in place to promote fairness and reduce the occurrence of ticket scalping.

questions.question: Can I get a refund for my ticket?
questions.answer: Please submit a support ticket and proceed from there.

questions.question: How do I transfer ticket(s)?
questions.answer: You can transfer tickets to your friend through your profile page.

questions.question: How do I confirm that my booking has been made/is successful?
questions.answer: You can view your ticket bookings on your profile page.

questions.question: What payment options are available?
questions.answer: You can pay via Visa/Mastercard credit/debit cards and GrabPay

questions.question: What happens if an event is cancelled or postponed?
questions.answer: We will inform how to proceed via email.

questions.question: The card used to purchase the ticket(s) has expired. Can I still get my refund?
questions.answer: Please submit a support ticket and proceed from there.

questions.question: Why should I use CrowwwdSync over other ticketing applications?
questions.answer: CrowwwdSync is the best ticketing application and provides fair and reliable ticketing.

questions.question: What browser is recommended for the optimum use of the website?
questions.answer: Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, Safari, Opera

questions.question: Can CrowwwdSync make decisions pertaining to the event(s)?
questions.answer: CrowwwdSync does not make any decisions pertaining to the event and only acts as a ticket distributor.

questions.question: Can I delete my account?
questions.answer: Yes you are able to do so

questions.question: How to change my password for My Account?
questions.answer: You can do so via the update profile button on the profile page

questions.question: Can I change/amend my address?
questions.answer: You can do so via the update profile button on the profile page

questions.question: Is there a physical outlet where we can visit?
How to contact us?
questions.answer: You can contact us via email at crowwwdsync@gmail.com

questions.question: How do I submit a support ticket?
questions.answer: You can either send an email to crowwwdsync@gmail.com or submit a ticket via the submit ticket link.
